rComments: Liza is amazing. She promotes good discussions, gives amazing feedback when editing, and is all around one of the sweetest teachers I've had. I'm a math major and I usually hate writing but Liza made me interested in the material. If you're looking for a good Kresge Core teacher, take her!!!

Liza is one of the best professors I've had. She is extremely easy to talk to and engaged in her teaching. Her class is simple, and the readings are not bad at all. I would definitely take this class once again if I had the chance to. Liza is by far my favorite professor

Liza is a FANTASTIC professor. She's down to earth, easy to engage in conversation with, and cares a lot about her students. She doesn't give a lot of work, and she always makes time for us to give writing advice and just talk about our work. I would recommend taking ANY class she teaches--it will be well worth it.
